text: Now I've said that, I've ended up practising TDD on the rest of the code anyway, I just can't write code without tests, I just can't do it.
Aww, not so many tests?  Did you get complaints about that?

Nope, no complaints at all - I think people understand when tests are skipped for the purposes of proving a point.That said, the only place I'm skipping them is in the blog posts, the repository contains tests for everything \o/
